Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2013 04:00PM Odyssea wrote: Ashley - did you end up having radiation?  I had immediate reconstruction with alloderm in 2008 and was recently diagnosed with a recurrence.  Lumpectomy is next week and radiation therapy is most certainly in my near future.  I was surprised that my PS didn't want to switch out my saline implants for silicone during the lumpectomy.  Did you get any more information about the impact radiation has on the implants?
Posts.Title: Radiation AFTER reconstruction with Alloderm? Ashlyn Odyssea
